name: Space Blaster (MCOGAMES)
description:
This is Space Blaster, a game made via Coursera. 

WASD For Movement

Left Click on Mouse To Shoot 

Primary Modifications:

1) Added a third level

2) Added a bonus level for beating the game

3) Added 1 new enemy type although it has the same behavior as the chaser enemy 

4) Added a try again button if player loses

Created by : Mauricio Ventura
